wikipedia_page.main: Vivienne Johnson is an English actress who is known for playing the supporting character of personal nurse to Young Mr. Grace in three seasons (1978-1981) of the British sitcom Are You Being Served?. She also appeared as Freda in Carry On England in 1976, and Marilyn in Odd Man Out opposite John Inman.

link_mentions.page: List of Are You Being Served? characters
response: Of the cast throughout the duration of the series and its sequel, all are deceased with the exception of Mike Berry, Penny Irving, Doremy Vernon and Vivienne Johnson.
=== Nurse to the Grace Brothers (Pat Astley (Series 5) and Vivienne Johnson (Series 6-8) ===

link_mentions.page: List of Carry On films cast members
response: * Vivienne Johnson (1) is only credited with appearing in England.  However, the previous year had seen her make three significant appearances in the Carry On Laughing TV series.

* Marilyn (Vivienne Johnson), the sex-obsessed Marilyn spends her time at Littlehampton using her knees to bend candy bananas. She speaks with a distinct Western accent. She is very flirtatious, especially towards Neville, who she calls 'Mr. Neville'. Johnson played the role of young mister Grace's nurse in Are You Being Served?.
*Vivienne Johnson, a British actress best known for her role in Are You Being Served?
